name: Abenteuer Europa
description: A point-and-click adventure game by the German SPD party, released for the 1994 European elections. Reporter Fred Beck stumbles upon a criminal organization that runs a scheme for the illegal disposal of toxic waste. Travelling through all 12 nations that made up the European Union in 1994, Fred follows the clues and learns about the importance of international laws and collaboration for combatting organized crime.
